secondaries.shortDescription: 3 points for kill one or more moled with plague weapon or enemy unit failer morale

subObjectives.description: Model killed by a plague weapon or enemy unit failed morale test

secondaries.shortDescription: Win point for completing this with Bobonic Astartus units (BA): (4pts) BA on enemy deploy zone, (4pts/6pts) BA wholy within 3/4 quaters, (4pts) control +half objectives with BA, (4pt) all objectives within contagion range

subObjectives.description: Bobonic Astartus wholly within enemy deployment zone
Bobonic Astartus wholly within 3 quaters and 6" form center
Bobonic Astartus wholly ALSO within 4th quater and 6" form center
Bobonic Astartus control MORE than half the objective
ALL the objectives within contagion range

secondaries.shortDescription: 3 pts for each contaminated objective. Action contaminate: completed at end of turn on a 4+ or losing 3 wounds.

subObjectives.description: Contaminated objective action: finished at the end of your turn. Success on 4+ or losing 3 mortal wounds (on the action unit)
